THE BEST GAME IN THE WORLD

This game is really good and interesting. I will not play versus cheaters if your trust factor is high. To improve the trust factor you should play fair, also you have to reach high steam level ( 100 level or >). You should not get any reports in game or reports on your steam profile. To not get reported you can buy some beautiful skins. You must have more than 1000 hours on record in game (If your skill in this game is high) to not give people a chance to think that you are cheating. GOOD LUCK AND HAVE FUN!
